desc: We obsess over everything, from how the tools fit in your hand to how the formulas glide over your skin. The result: a new breed of beauty products that puts an end to uneven eyeliner, mascara slip-ups, and blotchy brows. GUIDE BEAUTY offers a truly fresh approach to makeup that puts artistry into your hands.

layout.text:
GUIDE Beauty has reimagined makeup and how we apply it. Universally designed tools that literally guide your hand to better and easier application, along with luxurious, clean formulas.

Makeup applied with confidence. Beauty that feels great. #ConfidenceByDesign
